00038  PROGRAM main
00039 
00040 ! Common Variables
00041  USE Domain,      ONLY : iStep, MaxStep, RelaxStep, tDump, tStat
00042  USE FluidParams, ONLY : eps, pConv
00043  IMPLICIT NONE
00044 
00045 
00046 ! Read input parameters, allocate memory for common arrays and initialize
00047  CALL Parameters
00048  CALL MemAlloc(1)
00049  CALL Init
00050 
00051 ! Main iteration loop
00052  DO iStep = 1, MaxStep
00053 
00054    CALL PreStream
00055    CALL Hydrodynamics
00056    CALL PostStream
00057 
00058    IF (MOD(istep,tStat) == 0) CALL Stats
00059    IF (MOD(istep,tDump) == 0) CALL VtkPlane
00060 
00061    IF ( eps <= pConv ) EXIT
00062 
00063  END DO
00064  RelaxStep = iStep - 1
00065 
00066 ! Save final data set
00067  CALL FinalDump
00068  CALL VtkPlane
00069 
00070 ! Free Memory for common arrays
00071  CALL MemAlloc(2)
00072 
00073  END PROGRAM
